t: Tuft & Needle - Wikipedia
s: June 25, 2024 - On September 28, 2018, Tuft and Needle closed a merger with mattresses manufacturer Serta Simmons Bedding. In November 2018, they also announced a partnership with Amazon to release an Amazon-exclusive mattress called "The Nod." by Tuft & Needle.

t: What Tuft & Needle's Amazon-Powered Showroom Means for Mattress Marketing And Rest of Retail
s: August 15, 2017 - In this first venture, Tuft & Needle did the thinking for Amazon. They came with a new way for Amazon to become a true retail partner by asking Amazon to provide many of the essentials that retailers must offer – product information, customer service, purchase and delivery. ... But next time, what if Amazon churns its data to discover other category-leading brands ...
